'''Undying Sun''' is [[Mavuika]]'s Default [[Character Outfit]].

==Appearance==
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 1-2 paragraphs (preferably 1 paragraph) with 3-4 sentences each. -->
Mavuika wears a black biker bodysuit with red sun-shaped accents that leaves her sides and back exposed and a matching long-sleeved mini-jacket over it. She wears black high-heeled boots with red and orange decorations and spikes. Her accessories are black gloves, an intricately detailed golden choker and golden and red sun-shaped earrings.
